name: Chained (itch) (PhilToolan)
description:
When you are tied down by your anxiety, sometimes a friend can give you just enough support to help you keep moving. 

This 2D platformer explores this in an abstract way. 

Project programming by Philip Toolan, design and assets made by Alicia Martinez.

To play, download the zip file and extract it. Then click on the executable and enjoy!
